feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 05 January 2023
